item.description:
More Pleasure in Life

Why not have more pleasure in life? We get so caught up in problems and goals that we forget to enjoy life. We miss the simple pleasures inherent in everyday life experiences of walking, breathing, eating, looking, learning, experiencing. We'll slow live down to explore (with exercises) sensuality, physical and mental awareness and how to enjoy life so much more! We'll explore ways you can have more pleasure in life.
Optional macrobiotic meal with dessert by famous chef David Snieckus for additional $20 between 7 to 8:30pm. Let me know in at least one day in advance for the meal.

8:30 pm - 10:00 pm

(Traditional cost $30 - Sliding scale to $15)

Herb Pearce teaches personal growth workshops and is a personal life coach and therapist. He specializes in working with personality conflicts.

www.herbpearce.com
item.name: More Pleasure in Life
